about_the_game:
The T-72AV Tier 5 Premium Main Battle Tank is now available with brand-new blue camouflage! The T-72AV is an upgraded version of the T-72A Main Battle Tank, which, along with its export siblings called T-72M and T-72M1, is one of the most common T-72 variants in the world.

In 1985, the tank was equipped with Kontakt-1 Explosive Reactive Armor, providing protection against HEAT rounds and missiles of that time. Premium vehicles provide a number of bonuses to their users, including better Matchmaking and improved progression rate.
detailed_description:
The T-72AV Tier 5 Premium Main Battle Tank is now available with brand-new blue camouflage! The T-72AV is an upgraded version of the T-72A Main Battle Tank, which, along with its export siblings called T-72M and T-72M1, is one of the most common T-72 variants in the world.

In 1985, the tank was equipped with Kontakt-1 Explosive Reactive Armor, providing protection against HEAT rounds and missiles of that time. Premium vehicles provide a number of bonuses to their users, including better Matchmaking and improved progression rate.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core2Duo CPU 6700 @ 2.66GHz (2 CPUs), ~2.7GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9500 GT 512 MB or equivalent
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.1GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 275 896 MB or equivalent
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
